  • Method Details

    • getAllTrainings

      @GetMapping public List<TrainingDto> getAllTrainings()
      Retrieves all trainings and maps them to a list of TrainingDto objects.
      Returns:
      a list of TrainingDto objects representing all trainings

    • getTrainingsByUser

      @GetMapping("/{userId}") public List<TrainingDto> getTrainingsByUser(@PathVariable Long userId)
      Retrieves a list of trainings associated with the given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      a list of TrainingDto objects representing the trainings associated with the user

    • getTrainingsEndingAfter

      @GetMapping("/finished/{date}") public List<TrainingDto> getTrainingsEndingAfter(@PathVariable("date") @DateTimeFormat(pattern="yyyy-MM-dd") Date date)
      Retrieves a list of trainings that end after the specified date.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to compare against the end time of trainings
      Returns:
      a list of trainings that end after the specified date

    • getTrainingsByType

      @GetMapping("/activityType") public List<TrainingDto> getTrainingsByType(@RequestParam String activityType)
      Retrieves a list of TrainingDto objects based on the specified activity type.
      Parameters:
      activityType - the activity type to filter the trainings by
      Returns:
      a list of TrainingDto objects matching the specified activity type

    • createTraining

      @PostMapping @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public TrainingDto createTraining(@RequestBody TrainingWithoutUserDto trainingDto)
      Creates a new training entity for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      trainingDto - the TrainingWithoutUserDto object containing training details
      Returns:
      the created TrainingDto object

    • updateTraining

      @PutMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public TrainingDto updateTraining(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody TrainingWithoutUserDto trainingDto)
      Updates a training entity with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the training entity to update
      trainingDto - the TrainingWithoutUserDto object containing the updated training details
      Returns:
      the updated TrainingDto object
